name: Pfff (Platforms' Fun Forever)
short_description: Pfff (Platforms' Fun Forever) is a platform game engine written in Ruby which intends to be very adaptive to different platform games. It means many features : graphically independent games, many player own powers, many weapons, many movements, etc.
